segments.pli: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā anuruddho sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
segments.en: At one time Venerable Anuruddha was staying near Sāvatthī in Jeta’s Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s monastery.

segments.pli: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmatā anuruddhena saddhiṃ … pe … ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ etadavocuṃ:
segments.en: Then several mendicants went up to Venerable Anuruddha, exchanged greetings with him … and said:

segments.pli: “Katamesaṃ āyasmā anuruddho dhammānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññataṃ patto”ti?
segments.en: “What things has Venerable Anuruddha developed and cultivated to attain great direct knowledge?”

segments.pli: “Catunnaṃ khvāhaṃ, āvuso, satipaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññataṃ patto.
segments.en: “Reverends, I attained great direct knowledge by developing and cultivating the four kinds of mindfulness meditation.

segments.pli: Idhāhaṃ, āvuso, kāye kāyānupassī viharāmi … pe …
segments.en: I meditate observing an aspect of the body …

segments.pli: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ—
segments.en: principles—keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.

segments.pli: imesaṃ khvāhaṃ, āvuso, catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā mahābhiññataṃ patto.
segments.en: I attained great direct knowledge by developing and cultivating these four kinds of mindfulness meditation.

segments.pli: Imesañca panāhaṃ, āvuso, catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā kappasahassaṃ anussarāmī”ti.
segments.en: And it’s because of developing and cultivating these four kinds of mindfulness meditation that I recollect a thousand eons.”

sections.title: At one time Venerable Anuruddha was staying near Sāvatthī…

suttaplex.blurb: By developing the four kinds of mindfulness meditation Anuruddha surveys a thousand world systems.
